docs.text: Welcome to Bello For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # Die Konfigurations-Datei docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home
